    • Method Detail

      • setupPanel

        public void setupPanel()
        Description copied from class: ConfigurablePanel
        Method called in the constructor of a ConfigurablePanel after ConfigurablePanel.addUIProperty(UIProperty), ConfigurablePanel.addUIParameter(UIParameter) and ConfigurablePanel.addInternalProperty(InternalProperty). In this method, the subclasses must instantiate their JComponents and build the JPanel (itself) as in any user interface. In particular, the default values of the UIParameters can be used.
        Specified by:
        setupPanel in class ConfigurablePanel

        protected void initializeProperties()
        Description copied from class: ConfigurablePanel
        Method called in the constructor of a ConfigurablePanel. In this method, the subclasses must create their UIproperty and add them to the map of properties using ConfigurablePanel.addUIProperty(UIProperty).
        Specified by:

      • propertyhasChanged

        public void propertyhasChanged(java.lang.String name,
                      java.lang.String newvalue)
        Description copied from class: ConfigurablePanel
        Notifies the ConfigurablePanel subclass that the MMProperty linked to its UIProperty propertyName has changed in value. This function is called on the EDT and allows the subclass to change the states of its JComponents based on the new value of the UIProperty.
        Specified by:
        propertyhasChanged in class ConfigurablePanel
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the Property whose value has changed.
        newvalue - New value of the UIProperty

      • parameterhasChanged

        public void parameterhasChanged(java.lang.String label)
        Description copied from class: ConfigurablePanel
        Notifies the ConfigurablePanel subclass that the UIParameter parameterName value has changed. This method is called upon loading of the UI and whenever the user changes the configuration.
        Specified by:
        parameterhasChanged in class ConfigurablePanel
        Parameters:
        label - Name of the UIParameter

      • shutDown

        public void shutDown()
        Description copied from class: ConfigurablePanel
        Allows the ConfigurablePanel subclass to shut down all processes, e.g. SwingWorkers. This method is called when EMU is closing.
        Specified by:
        shutDown in class ConfigurablePanel
